topic: Sport Workflow Series ("Association Football Players explorative search")

goals.1: Identify the BGP for association football player
goals.2: Identify the BGP for association football club
goals.3: Identify the BGP for association football league
goals.4: Return for each european country the number of association football leagues (the result set must be a list of triples country IRI, label and #leagues).
goals.5: Identify the BGP for the ballon d'Or award
goals.6: Return the countries which have at least two different players of their nationality (consider the country of citizenship) who won the ballon d'Or (the result set must be a list of triples country IRI, label and #different players).
goals.7: Identify the BGP of the FIFA World Cup
goals.8: Who are the players who partecipated in more than 4 world's cup editions? (the result set must be a list of triples player IRI, label and #participations).
goals.9: Consider the countries that won the FIFA World Cup at least twice. Find the players of those countries won the ballon d'Or (the result set must be a list of couples player IRI and label).

name: f7cbfe446e

1.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?p ?name WHERE { wd:Q11571 ?p ?obj . ?p sc:name ?name. } LIMIT 20
